content:
MediaPermissionAudio Enum

Definition

Specifies the permission level for audio.

In this Article

public enum MediaPermissionAudio
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
MediaPermissionAudio

Examples

The following code example shows the use of the Audio property. 

<MediaPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, Audio:=MediaPermissionAudio.SiteOfOriginAudio)>
Public Sub Method04()
End Sub

[MediaPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, Audio = MediaPermissionAudio.SiteOfOriginAudio)]

Remarks

Use this enumeration to set the MediaPermissionAudio property of the MediaPermission class. The default is SafeAudio.

Fields

AllAudio

Permission that allows unrestricted audio playback.
NoAudio

Permission that denies all audio playback.
SafeAudio

Permission that allows safe, limited audio playback, which includes denying stream access to the image file.
SiteOfOriginAudio

Permission that only allows audio playback of files that are located at the application's site of origin.
